title: Resolve providing for a special commission on the field of emergency management

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vieira of Falmouth, a petition (accompanied by resolve, House, No. 885) of David T. Vieira for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the field of emergency management.  Emergency Preparedness and Management.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Emergency Preparedness and Management

related_entities.name: committee on Emergency Preparedness and Management

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Resolve reported favorably by committee as changed and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means
